thread.title: Great place to stay!
thread.title_full: Great place to stay! - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: KellyTravels2
title: Great place to stay!
text:
We stayed here back in December of 2015 and loved it. We landed late and got to the hotel late. We walked up to a large 15' door with a giant knocker on the front...like something out of the Adams Family. Walked it and had to take a flight of stairs up to the second floor where registration was. There was an elevator, however a very old hand-cranked one. I am an adventurous person, but that elevator just didn't look safe. Nonetheless, we made it to our room. Now don't expect first class luxury at this place, we are well-traveled people, having a place to lay your head was our only goal. Modest accommodations but had everything we needed. They had these beautiful window shutters that opened up to the road below, made for great morning coffee location. All in all an ideal, inexpensive place to stay.
Room Tip: Wifi is spotty, understandably. Try to get a room near the visibly hung routers throughout the hall... See more room tips
